recipesJson.name: Summer Salvation
recipesJson.author: KAUZ514
recipesJson.description: It's the beginning of June and in Montreal we still haven't seen any nice weather, only rain.....  I created this mix to lift my spirits and bring a little summer into my life. Well balanced and fruity, I think this a perfect summer Vape. Hope you guys enjoy! üçìüçàü•í

reviews.text: Excellent stuff.  I'm off to mix more of this.  That touch of blackberry and cucumber really sets this apart from most of the other summertime melon recipes that get posted.
